name: Hexedmas
description:
This is a work-in-progress. It only represents the game exactly as it was before the jam's deadline, and does not represent the final product or the actual amount of finished work.

Concept

A 1st person shooter where you play as a kid defending their fort from a horde of snowguys (hexed by a holiday-hating hag) by throwing snowballs gathered from their corposes at them.

The game is an attempt to make the shooter genre more playable for those with hand tremors without the use of aim assist by instead widening the projectiles that are shot and limiting mouse movement to only one axis.

This is the first shooter I've ever made and this is the progress I made in only 3 days.

Incomplete/missing Features
  • Scoring system
  • Start/end game (Planned: kill x before timer runs out)
  • Melee
  • Title screen (was made, but scrapped because of time)
  • Tutorial (just tells you the controls and the goal)
  • Credits
  • Settings
Controls

WASD - Movement

Mouse - Aim

Left mouse button - shoot
